text:
Aasif Khan
M.P .E.B. Colony Loni, Burhanpur (M.P .)
Mob. - +91-8962216498
Forward thinking Mechanical Engineer with over four years’ experience in product design and 
development, project management, and quality assurance. Skilled in machining, adhesive 
bonding, brazing, soldering, and welding with a strong understanding of engineering mechanics, 
principles, and materials.

Product Development
Project Management
Documentation
Team Leadership

Pali, Rajasthan                                                                                         (June 2014 to Till Date)

project stages.
Expertise in conducting design reviews, supervising personnel, estimating labour, 
establishing schedules, creating contingency plans, and maintaining budgets.

mechanical disciplines.
Superior analytical, communication, and presentation abilities.

Indore, Madhya Pradesh                                                                       (July 2012 to June 2014)

Responsible in checking the specification and the capacity of the machine and
